text: Ann-Margret Olssen (born April 28, 1941 in Valsjobyn, Sweden, more often known as just Ann-Margret) is a television and movie actress. She has won five Golden Globe Awards for her many performances. Her movies include The Cincinnati Kid and Carnal Knowledge. From 1967 until his death in 2017, she was married to actor Roger Smith. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Ann-Margret
